block.p: BASEBALL

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed INF Mark Lewis on the 15-day disabled list. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed RHP Dave Mlicki on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Erik Hiljus from Toledo of the International League. Signed RHP Ryan Crist and assigned him to Oneonta of the New York-Penn League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed OF Raul Mondesi on the 15-day disabled list.
BASEBALL

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed INF Mark Lewis on the 15-day disabled list. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed RHP Dave Mlicki on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Erik Hiljus from Toledo of the International League. Signed RHP Ryan Crist and assigned him to Oneonta of the New York-Penn League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed OF Raul Mondesi on the 15-day disabled list.

National League COLORADO ROCKIES--Traded RHP Rolando Arrojo and RHP Rick Croushore, INF Mike Lansing and cash to the Boston Red Sox for RHP Brian Rose, RHP John Wasdin and RHP Jeff Taglienti, and INF Jeff Frye. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Activated C Todd Hundley and RHP Gregg Olson from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned C Paul Loduca, RHP Eric Gagne and LHP Onan Masaokato to Albuquerque of the PCL. METS--Sent RHP Grant Roberts to Norfolk of the International League. Acitvated INF Kurt Abbott from the 15-day disabled list. MONTREAL EXPOS--Activated RHP Hideki Irabu from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Guillermo Mota to Ottawa of the International League. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Agreed to terms with LHP Omar Daal on a one-year contract extension and 2B Chase Utley. Designated RHP Kirk Bullinger for assignment. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Activated OF J.D. Drew from the 15-day disabled list.
Atlantic League NEWARK BEARS--Announced the contract of 3B Mike Berry has been sold to the Los Angeles Dodgers, who assigned him to San Antonio of the Texas League.

Northern League SIOUX FALLS CANARIES--Placed RHP Troy Silva on the disabled list, retroactive to July 25. Acquired OF Felix Pagan from Duluth-Superior for OF David Tidwell. Signed Tidwell and LHP Chris Celano.
Western Baseball League YUMA BULLFROGS--Conditionally released C Casey Cloud due to injury. Agreed to terms with RHP Curt Lyons. ZION PIONEERZZ--Activated OF Kalin Foulds from the disabled list.
BASKETBALL
Women's National Basketball Association UTAH STARZZ--Placed F Naomi Mulitauaopele on the injured list.
International Basketball League CINCINNATI STUFF--Named L.P. Nichols assistant coach.
HOCKEY

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with LW Mike Leclerc on a one-year contract. CALGARY FLAMES--Signed LW Jeff Cowan and D Dallas Eakins. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Signed D Chris McAlpine and D Steven Poapst. Re-signed F Dean McAmmond, D Marty Wilford and F Casey Hankinson. DALLAS STARS--Named Paul McIntosh professional scout. ISLANDERS--Signed C Jesse Belanger, C Robert Petrovicky and LW Jeff Toms. RANGERS--Agreed to terms with RW Jeff Ulmer. ST. LOUIS BLUES--Signed F Chris Murray and D Bryce Salvador to multi-year contracts.
International Hockey League MANITOBA MOOSE--Signed RW Bret Meyers.
Central Hockey League FAYETTEVILLE FORCE--Named Todd Gordon coach.
East Coast Hockey League SOUTH CAROLINA STINGRAYS--Signed C Greg Schmidt.

United Hockey League KNOXVILLE SPEED--Signed F Andrew Tortorella and F Doug Merrell to one-year contracts. MADISON KODIAKS--Announced that team is relocating to Kalamzoo, Mich. and will be known as the Kalamazoo Wings for the 2000-01 season.
SOCCER
National Professional Soccer League HARRISBURG HEAT--Signed F Gino DiFlorio to a three-year contract.
COLLEGE

METRO ATLANTIC ATHLETIC CONFERENCE--Named Raymond Ricci director of sales for MAAC Properties. ASHLAND--Named Joel Terman women's tennis coach. BROWN--Announced the addition of women's golf as a varsity sport for the 2000-01 academic year. CAMPBELL--Named Drew Peterson softball coach. CENTRAL CONNECTICUT STATE--Named Gene Gumbs assistant athletic director for sports information. CONNECTICUT--Named Lisa Cole women's assistant soccer coach. DREXEL--Announced men's basketball freshman G Tim Whitworth and women's basketball junior F Michelle Maslowski have been granted an additional year of eligibility because of medical hardships. FRANKLIN & MARSHALL--Named Jennifer Jacobson men's and women's cross country and track and field coach. GUILFORD--Named Tara Caminiti-Raggett women's lacrosse coach. INDIANA--Named Tom Harp assistant football coach. LONGWOOD--Named Krista Jay women's assistant basketball coach. MONTANA TECH--Named Meg Haran-Murphy women's basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA--Announced women's basketball G Nikki Teasley is taking a year off from school. QUINNIPIAC--Announced the addition of men's and women's outdoor track as a varsity sport for the 2000-01 academic year. ROWAN--Named Gabrielle Lisella women's basketball coach. ST. FRANCIS, IND.--Named Walter Jordan, James Blackmon, Gay Martin and Mike Carpenter men's assistant basketball coaches. ST. MARY'S, MINN.--Named Kelly Kimball nordic ski coach. SOUTH CAROLINA-AIKEN--Named Brandon Aiken trainer. TRUMAN STATE--Named John Sloop women's basketball coach. VERMONT--Announced the retirement of Sally Guerette, assistant athletic director and senior women's adminstrator, effective Aug. 31.
